scripts.prebuild: node -e "const os=require('os');const platform=os.platform();if(platform==='linux'){require('child_process').execSync('npm install --include=optional --no-save @rollup/rollup-linux-x64-gnu@^4.52.5',{stdio:'inherit'})}else if(platform==='darwin'){require('child_process').execSync('npm install --include=optional --no-save @rollup/rollup-darwin-x64@^4.52.5 @rollup/rollup-darwin-arm64@^4.52.5',{stdio:'inherit'})}else if(platform==='win32'){require('child_process').execSync('npm install --include=optional --no-save @rollup/rollup-win32-x64-msvc@^4.52.5',{stdio:'inherit'})}" || true
scripts.postinstall: node -e "const os=require('os');const platform=os.platform();if(platform==='linux'){require('child_process').execSync('npm install --include=optional --no-save @rollup/rollup-linux-x64-gnu@^4.52.5',{stdio:'inherit'})}else if(platform==='darwin'){require('child_process').execSync('npm install --include=optional --no-save @rollup/rollup-darwin-x64@^4.52.5 @rollup/rollup-darwin-arm64@^4.52.5',{stdio:'inherit'})}else if(platform==='win32'){require('child_process').execSync('npm install --include=optional --no-save @rollup/rollup-win32-x64-msvc@^4.52.5',{stdio:'inherit'})}" || true
